UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.message: The requested page was not found. Please try again later.

UNAUTHORIZED.message: You are unauthorized to view this page.

INCOMPLETE_ARGS.message: Incomplete arguments provided. Please try again later.

AGE_LESS_THAN_18.message: You must be 18 years old to have a bank account.

BENEFICIARY_ITSELF.message: You cannot add yourself as your beneficiary.

MINIMUM_TRANSACTION_ERROR.message: You can only make transaction of atleast Rs. 10.

NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE.message: You do not have enough balance to make this transaction.
